programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺

programme.title: 敦煌，千年不散的宴席
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 中华民族之所以五千年生生不息、绵延不绝，就是因为我们的语言、文字、风俗、饮食都是千年传承，从来没有中断。观众发现，以往秦川、安秋导演创作的敦煌纪录片都承载了非常厚重的历史文化信息，这次的美食片却大不一样，从主题定位、人物故事、叙事方式等都有了非常大的改变，叙述风格也生动活泼了很多，让观众看到了更多的人间烟火，一种田园诗般的美。该片通过将敦煌壁画饮食文化呈现出来，并将当下敦煌百姓的生活状态、一日三餐、加工食物的过程忠实记录下来，以展现敦煌饮食文化的传承与发展。.

programme.desc: (重) 没有大师光环，他们隐于田间地头、街头巷尾。没有太多的内功和花招，他们的功夫是经年累月的熟能生巧。没有高级或靓丽的食材，但他们深知，风味发于土生土长。黄继良的稻香鸭与凉拌猪眼睛，显露着一位厨子最守本的初心中可能有着最应变的眼界。老街上袁婆婆的剔骨肉，一夕成为网红店的背后，是她十数年一如既往地珍惜客人的意见。吕二娃的“肺片汤”，汤底沸腾着，一个温暖鲜活的冬日早晨。马村龚师傅的鱼头，三点一线的生活，是为了让生活的每一面都时刻保鲜。他们，苦修一门，如何令一道地方家常菜从众多美食中显露，乡厨们因地取材、变废.

programme.title: 人心鉴定师

programme.title: 人心鉴定师

programme.title: 金色大道
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重) 家慧羡慕敢作敢当的坏学生，她想变坏也没勇气。建志说有些人坏在骨子里看不出，不确定自己是不是也这样。六木承诺给珍玉好的生活，珍玉却知足常乐。学敏报答六木救命之恩，让他到一聪公司上班。金条气六木不守承诺，建志却鼓励他独立，金条答应为了小美努力。珍婷发现建志裸奔，见他有义气，对他改观。阿通向建志承认杀人….

programme.title: 绚耀爱情
programme.desc: 来到日本山形县，双J终于见识了能歌善舞的日本见习舞娘，并被她们超高的技艺所折服。然而，铭耀却做了一件让舞技们傻眼的事，到底是什么呢？.

programme.title: 星期二特写 ：我行我路
programme.desc: 七十二岁的陈瑞月儿时染上小儿麻痹症，需靠轮椅代步。热爱跳舞的她，在退休后创办轮椅舞团展现舞姿。芳龄二十四的视障艺术家张丽玲患有罕见眼疾，却坚毅踏上表演艺术道路。是什么推动她们勇敢追梦？她们的自立自强，又如何鼓舞他人实现自我价值？.

programme.title: 时光倾城
programme.desc: (PG-些许性相关语) 禾风请贵山帮忙查找爱情骗子资料，月心假装相亲约会骗子袁帅，月心狼狈，差点暴露身份，禾风对她数落一番。月心不甘心，不听劝告独自前往约会，被识破身份并迷晕非礼。Hanzo 早有计划，借此机会检举敌对势力救月心，博其好感。禾风得知月心经历，愧疚道歉。月心反应过度，情绪激动哭泣离开，禾风吓了一跳…….

programme.title: 名厨出走记
programme.desc: (重)《名厨出走记》是个另类的美食节目. 制作队安排平常习惯在宽敞、设备齐全厨房工作的厨师们出走，带他们到深山林中，让他们就地取材，用巧手煮出另类料理。也借由节目，让厨师利用他们的长才为落后地区付出他们的一份力. 该节目荣获《红星大奖》多个奖项，而《精华版》更收集了该节目最精彩的集数，让观众重温厨师们的苦与乐！.

programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重) 向往自由的纪云禾再次被长意囚禁，她为了化解万花谷与北渊的恩怨，舍命救下了寒霜发作的万花谷御灵师。纪云禾去世后，重生为九尾狐并失去记忆。长意与恢复记忆的云禾最终破镜重圆，共同对付仙师与顺德仙姬，拯救苍生后终得相守。.

programme.title: 金色大道
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(重) 六木和金条准备逃亡到泰国，发现码头贴有通缉他们的告示，最终两人侥幸脱身……回到12年前六木在一聪栽培下参与黄金回购计划，金条则决定开始打泰拳。珍玉知道六木帮一聪工作后，因不想拖累他而提出分手。建志失业，苦恼不已，家慧鼓励。建志以为家慧怀孕，家慧说是吓唬建志的，然而家慧无奈告知，珍婷已知两人发生关系一事…….

programme.title: 开着餐车趴趴走
programme.desc: (PG) 怡保，有着山城的美称，更是美食天堂。三人除了享用美食，也探索石灰岩洞穴、还欣赏了壮观的史前壁画。此外，他们也前往务边的沉香山茶园，了解这一特别的植物。这站的美食交流会，三人将烹煮新加坡的干捞怡保河粉。.

programme.title: 时光倾城

programme.title: 线人2
programme.desc: (重) 普拉托是欧洲女装加工和批发中心，也是华人最集中的城市。当地华人靠普拉托生存和拓展；普拉托却借助华人的勤奋重整旗鼓，强化往日欧洲服装强国的地位。对年轻一代来说，这里是归宿，还是素未谋面的中国，才是家园？.

programme.title: 职场福尔摩斯
programme.desc: (重) 数据显示，新加坡商业犯罪案件大幅度增加。在这一集的节目里，Pornsak了解到在信息时代里，骇客如何入侵手机甚至如何攻击伺服器，他同时了解到商业犯罪类型以及犯罪手法，看专家们如何让诈骗罪犯无所遁形。.

programme.title: 双重人生
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 韩会长吩咐美娜（妍珠）驾大媳妇戴熙的车出门，却差点遭到车祸，当时下意识地恢复了记忆。后来发现开的车子被韩会长动了手脚煞车失灵。.

programme.title: 纱丽迷情
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/泰) 雷克欲与凯吉同归于尽不果，死于森林里。烨泽王子和霜玥为摆脱西晨追捕而跳崖。.

programme.title: 拜托了夏天

programme.title: 世界跟我这Young玩
programme.desc: (重) 旅行可以千篇一律，也可以万中选一。如果你喜爱独特胜过跟风，期待在大城市激荡出一连串美丽的小惊奇，那跟着我们就对了！ 「世界跟我这Young玩」采用时下年轻人最IN的随拍记录，且战且走，细细品味旅游二三事。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴
programme.desc: (重) 古典名著《水浒传》里108位英雄，缔造出世代津津乐道的传奇事迹。豪情万丈的英雄气息，在中国山东梁山，不只可以感受得到，也品尝得到。这一集，主持人杨君伟登上梁山，赴一场精美绝伦的水浒飨宴。.

programme.title: 双重人生

programme.title: 十大新加坡
programme.desc: (重) 新加坡人花钱不手软，几千元买一件衣服，上万元买一个旅游配套的，大有人在！究竟新加坡人最舍得把钱花在什么地方？衣？食？住？行？还是…这集节目就带你去看新加坡人有多会花钱！.

programme.title: 幸福方程式
programme.desc: (重) 当死亡到来的那天，一个人假如没有家人又有经济困难，他的后事该怎么办？ 在新加坡，就有一位年长者多年来免费替无依无靠的老人处理后事，但他并不是殡葬业者。究竟是什么原因让他不分种族、不分信仰，愿意为素未谋面的人倾心付出？.

programme.title: Hantu Tenggek
programme.desc: A group of con-artists headed by Tariq that pretend to exorcise haunted places are blackmailed by Tuan Sidek, a building developer. They have to convince Tuan Sidek's rival that a certain building is haunted when they got trapped inside it. Except that they do not need convincing as the building is really haunted by a restless spirit. The spirit needs their help to fulfil its last wish.

programme.title: Nyanyuk
programme.desc: The story of Pak Zali and Mak Minah who is taking care of each other because one of them had Alzheimer's in their twilight years. Will they be able to get through it together?

programme.title: Raya Talak Satu
programme.desc: Danni's mother forced him to marry Ria because she needed money for her sister's surgery. Will they succeed in fulfilling their mother's dreams even though they hate each other?

programme.title: Riuh-Riuh Ramadan
programme.desc: A newly released ex-convict, Hashim (B) tries to repent and turn a new leaf in Ramadan but is faced with resistance due to pre-conceived stereotypes intertwined with hidden agenda from a man of the same name, Hashim (A), and his wife Junipah. His transformation is made more difficult by Hashim (A) and Junipah's son, Khalid, who is tasked to educate Vicky. She is a recent muallaf who is being taught on the ways of Ramadan, but is interrupted by Vicky's know-it-all friend, Muna.

programme.title: Sentuhan Harapan
programme.desc: With one third of the villagers born with disabilities, Karangpatihan in East Java is known as the idiot village for its high number of villagers with mental disabilities. Due to safety concerns, some of them are subjected to pasung - the act of caging and shackling the disabled.

programme.title: Mechamato 'The Animated Series' S2

programme.title: Projek L.I.T. S2
programme.desc: In this weeks episode of Projek LIT, we will learn about simple machines and how they can help us lighten loads. We will also learn the meaning of the proverb "Ada Gula, Adalah Semut". We will learn how to make chocolate chip cookie and even play games from the past - kuti-kuti and country erasers! Get ready to explore and be entertained with our hosts, Daya, Farah and Zhin!

programme.title: Mulut Masin
programme.desc: A ragtag group of five unruly cousins are convinced that they have been cursed by their late grandmother for losing her last will. In order to break the curse, they have to find the will before the curse tears their family apart.

programme.title: Ini Baru Rare
programme.desc: Four friends embark on an adventure exploring the European Alps up to the Mediterranean Sea shortly after the world opened its borders after the crisis of the Covid-19 pandemic. How is the adventure world doing after two years closed? Witness their experience across the European Alps, France, Austria, Germany, and Liechtenstein. What are the challenges ahead? Watch the first season of this Travelogue.

programme.title: Makan INC
programme.desc: Sofia becomes more inspired to defeat Vicky and emerge as champion for the NHA competition. Helmi is forced to openly admit to his past crimes, affecting his relationship with Hayati and Haikal. Ashraf's legal case raises doubts in Daud whether Rizal has been the one who deserves to manage Makan Inc all this time.

programme.title: Bubur Masjid Air Katira S4
programme.desc: The mosque committee members, headed by Taufik, are eager to embark on a special Ramadan program. Rahmat misleads Taufik into thinking he will sponsor the donation distribution but expectations only lead to disappointment. Sakinah is worried about the household expenses, while Noor falls out with Siti over her online ladies wear business. Siti is determined to prove she has flair for business, too.

programme.title: Bubur Masjid Air Katira S4
programme.desc: One beats the bush and another has the hare. Amongst the mosque committee members, a few have something up their sleeves. What is their intention? Syazwan is now helping Sakinah with her flourishing porridge business. However, instead of gaining sustenance, other issues start to surface. Noor is reeling with jealousy over Siti's newly launched business. Meanwhile, the GM receives an anonymous letter. What is the content of the letter and what will the GM do about it?

programme.title: Bubur Masjid Air Katira S4
programme.desc: Taufik organizes another admirable program for the community. Much to his disappointment, the event is unintentionally sabotaged by someone in the committee who has his own personal agenda. Siti's business is picking up and getting the attention she desires. However, her aggressive marketing strategy is at the expense of Jasmine's feelings. Meanwhile, Sakinah is having trouble managing her business with her daily house chores. She finds a shortcut to her problems.

programme.title: Bubur Masjid Air Katira S4
programme.desc: Taufik gets an Ustaz to share the difference between Zakat contribution and donation. Rahmat feels it is an indirect attack on him and gets offended. Taufik starts to feel belittled by Sakinah's earning power and their marriage strains further. Noor and Jasmine get upset with Sakinah when they see her cosying up to Siti. GM receives another anonymous hate letter. He confronted the committee members and urged the perpetrator to come forward.

programme.title: Bubur Masjid Air Katira S4
programme.desc: Sakinah and Noor got into an argument with their husbands. They panicked when Taufik and Rahmat disappeared and cannot be contacted. Rahmat and Taufik are affected emotionally when they were shamed during a committee meeting. Siti suffers an embarrassing backlash for her overzealousness. Syazwan receives good news, but is still bothered by Jasmine's emotional outbursts. Will all of them reconcile and tie lose ends before the arrival of Syawal?
